title: Celebrities wearing football shirts - BBC Three
text:
Read more about these links Twitter 
Voice of UK garage and Southampton FC fan Craig David was spotted at the EFL Cup final on Sunday watching his side lose 3-2 to Manchester United. 
Despite the disappointment of defeat at Wembley, Craig didn't miss the chance to show off his new customised Saints replica shirt, complete with his full name and number one on the back. Let the fun begin! @SouthamptonFC v Manchester United. üèÜ #EFL pic.twitter.com/nG7SeUVe1A twitter 
At first we thought someone should really fill Craig in on why wearing one on anything other than a goalkeeper's shirt is a football crime. 
Then we wondered which other celebrities have a passion for wearing their team's replica kit, and here we are: 
Beyonce - USA A post shared by Beyonc√© (@beyonce) on Jul 5, 2015 at 5:33pm PDT 
Queen B may not have been in the stands to support the USA during their victorious 2015 Women's World Cup, but she'd have been crazy in love with the team's performances, cheering on from home wearing a personalised jersey. 
Interesting that she opted for Yonce. The printing must have been priced by the letter. 
Drake - Juventus
